whyChoose.title: Why Choose WebsDee?
whyChoose.subtitle: We provide a range of benefits that set us apart
whyChoose.description: Helping Small Businesses Succeed Online. At WebsDee, we believe that every business deserves a great website—without the big price tag. We're a passionate team dedicated to making web design simple, fast, and affordable for entrepreneurs, freelancers, and small business owners. Whether you're just starting out or looking to grow, we're here to help you shine online.

hero.title: Your Partner in Going Digital
hero.description: We started WebsDee with one clear goal: to make professional websites affordable and accessible to everyone. Our team combines creativity, technical skill, and a deep understanding of small business needs to deliver websites that work—and look great doing it.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower small businesses and individuals by providing affordable, high-quality web solutions with speed, transparency, and care.
mission.belief: We believe every business deserves a great online presence, regardless of size or budget. That's why we've created website packages that deliver professional results at prices small businesses can afford.
mission.team: Our team brings together expertise in design, development, and digital marketing to create websites that not only look beautiful but also help you achieve your business goals.

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Your website ready in days, not months

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.name: Team WebsDee
team.description1: We're a small, dedicated team of designers, developers, and digital specialists who are passionate about helping businesses succeed online.
team.description2: Each member of our team brings unique skills and perspectives, but we all share the same commitment: making professional web design affordable and accessible for everyone.

cta.title: Let's Build Something Great Together
cta.description: Whether you're launching a new brand or upgrading your online presence, we're here to help you every step of the way.

hero.title: Tailored Solutions for Your Business Goals
hero.description: We understand that every business is different. That's why we offer flexible website solutions that can grow with your business and help you stand out in a crowded digital world.

local.title: Local Businesses
local.description: Reach more customers in your neighborhood

freelancers.title: Freelancers & Creatives
freelancers.description: Show off your portfolio with style

step1.title: Understand your business goals
step1.description: We start by learning about your business, your audience, and what you want to achieve with your website.

step2.title: Match you with the right website solution
step2.description: Based on your needs and budget, we recommend the best package or custom solution for your business.

step3.title: Deliver a beautiful, functional website
step3.description: We design and develop your website with care, ensuring it looks great and works perfectly.

step4.title: Offer upgrades and support as you grow
step4.description: Our relationship doesn't end at launch. We're here to help as your business evolves and your website needs change.

success.title: Success Stories
success.collection: We're collecting success stories from our clients
success.quote: We're excited to share how our solutions have helped businesses like yours. Check back soon for real-world examples of our work and the results our clients have achieved.

cta.title: Ready to Find Your Solution?
cta.description: Let's discuss how we can help your business succeed online with a website solution tailored to your unique needs.

hero.title: Affordable, Professional Website Services
hero.description: At WebsDee, we offer all-in-one web services designed for small businesses, startups, and entrepreneurs who want to go online without breaking the bank. Whether you're just starting out or ready to scale, we've got a solution that fits.

starter.question: 💸 How much does a starter website cost?
starter.answer: Our starter package starts at $99, perfect for personal brands or basic business presence

howLong.question: 🕒 How long does it take to build a website?
howLong.answer: Most websites take 5-7 days to build, but custom projects can take longer

responsive.question: 📱 Does the website work on all devices?
responsive.answer: Yes, our websites are fully responsive and look great on all devices

ecommerce.question: 🛍️ How much does an eCommerce website cost?
ecommerce.answer: Our eCommerce package starts at $450, including WooCommerce setup and payment gateway integration

seo.question: 📈 Does the website have SEO features?
seo.answer: Yes, all our websites are SEO-optimized for better search engine visibility

maintenance.question: 🔧 Does the website come with ongoing support?
maintenance.answer: Yes, we offer ongoing maintenance and support to ensure your website stays up-to-date and secure

hiddenCost.question: 💸 Are there any hidden costs?
hiddenCost.answer: No, the price you see is the price you pay. No hidden fees or additional costs
